languages.text: "По пиратским законам, Вольный Торговец! Мы думали, вы человек благородных нравов!"

traits.locale_text: "Пиратским законам, Вольный Торговец! Мы думали, вы человек благородных нравов".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Under pirate law, Rogue Trader! We thought you a {mf|man|woman} of honour!"
languages.original_text: "По пиратским законам, Вольный Торговец! Мы думали, вы человек благородных нравов!"

traits.locale_text: "Under the pirate laws, Rouge Trader! We thought you were a person of noble blood!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Under the pirate laws, Rouge Trader! We thought you were a person of noble blood!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Under pirate law, Rogue Trader! We thought you a {mf|man|woman} of honour!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Under pirate law, Rogue Trader! We thought you a {mf|man|woman} of honour!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Under pirate law, Rogue Trader! We thought you a {mf|man|woman} of honour!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “这简直是海盗的律法，行商浪人！我们本以为你是个有荣誉感的人！”
languages.original_text: "Under pirate law, Rogue Trader! We thought you a {mf|man|woman} of honour!"

traits.locale_text: “这简直是海盗的律法，行商浪人！我们本以为你是个有荣誉感的人！”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «¡Es una ley de piratería, Comerciante Independiente! ¡Pensaba que era un{mf| hombre|a mujer} de honor!».
languages.original_text: "Under pirate law, Rogue Trader! We thought you a {mf|man|woman} of honour!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Es una ley de piratería, Comerciante Independiente! ¡Pensaba que era un{mf| hombre|a mujer} de honor!».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「海賊風情の法が、自由開拓者！誉れある人物だと思っていたのに！」
languages.original_text: "Under pirate law, Rogue Trader! We thought you a {mf|man|woman} of honour!"

traits.locale_text: 「海賊風情の法が、自由開拓者！誉れある人物だと思っていたのに！」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Gemäß Piratengesetzen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Wir hatten Euch für {mf|einen Mann|eine Frau} von Ehre gehalten!"
languages.original_text: "Under pirate law, Rogue Trader! We thought you a {mf|man|woman} of honour!"

traits.locale_text: "Gemäß Piratengesetzen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Wir hatten Euch für {mf|einen Mann|eine Frau} von Ehre gehalten!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Vous parlez là de loi des pirates, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Nous vous avions pris pour {mf|un homme|une femme} d'honneur ! »
languages.original_text: "Under pirate law, Rogue Trader! We thought you a {mf|man|woman} of honour!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous parlez là de loi des pirates, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Nous vous avions pris pour {mf|un homme|une femme} d'honneur ! »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Kontrat, korsanlık kanunlarınca imzalanmış Hür Tacir! Sizin onurlu bir {mf|adam|kadın} olduğunuzu sanmıştık!"
languages.original_text: "Under pirate law, Rogue Trader! We thought you a {mf|man|woman} of honour!"

traits.locale_text: "Kontrat korsanlık kanunlarınca imzalanmış Hür Tacir! Sizin onurlu bir {mf|adam|kadın} olduğunuzu sanmıştık!"
